price: Kwa hakika hivi ndivyo tunavyo walipa wanao fanya mema.
footnotes: Hakika Sisi huwalipa walio tenda mema mfano wa haya. Basi aliingia katika Jihadi kulinyanyua Neno letu, na akavumilia maudhi kwa ajili yetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
